name: Thiazyl fluoride
desc: Thiazyl fluoride, NSF, is a colourless, pungent gas that is unstable at room temperature. Along with thiazyl trifluoride, NSF3, it is an important precursor to other sulfur-nitrogen-fluorine compounds.
standard state:
Except where otherwise noted, data are given for materials in their standard state (at 25 °C [77 °F], 100 kPa).
